item.title: [Nintendo Switch] Tatanga
item.description: Tatanga A prototype for a 2D platformer based on Newton’s law of universal gravitation. Github page : (https://github.com/Tardigrade-nx/Tatanga) Vid√©o : (https://youtu.be/BflQidQx_wo)
